readable.content: A young woman dressed in black and another with purple hair hold up signs offering free hugs . Two girls are holding up signs offering ' free hugs ' Two people with signs reading " Free Hug " are staring with people nearby . Two women , one with purple hair , holding signs advertizing free hugs . Two women with signs that say " Free hugs " .
